text: Today on the West Coast, itâ€™s looking poor with 6 ft @9s W swell, but fresh 22 mph SW winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow brings a nice change with 5 ft @10s NW swell and light 2 mph N winds, offering clean conditions at spots like Balephetrish and Balevullin Bay. The day after, expect similar 5 ft @8s WNW swell, but winds pick up to 13 mph WSW, making it a bit choppy. Best: tomorrow.
